key.name: auto-save-delay
key.description: The delay in seconds to wait before auto-saving a draft.

key.name: style-variant
key.description: Use the light or dark variant of the GTK theme and/or GtkSourceView style scheme.

key.name: indent-style
key.description: If the editor should insert multiple spaces characters instead of tabs.

key.name: auto-indent
key.description: Automatically indent new lines copying the previous line's indentation.

key.name: tab-width
key.description: The number of spaces represented by a tab.

key.name: indent-width
key.description: The number of spaces to indent or -1 to use tab-width.

key.name: show-line-numbers
key.description: If line numbers should be displayed next to each line.

key.name: show-right-margin
key.description: If a margin line should be displayed on the right of the editor.

key.name: right-margin-position
key.description: The position in characters at which the right margin should be displayed.

key.name: show-map
key.description: If enabled, an overview map of the file will be displayed to the side of the editor.

key.name: show-grid
key.description: If enabled, a blueprint style grid is printed on the editor background.

key.name: highlight-current-line
key.description: If enabled, the current line will be highlighted.

key.name: wrap-text
key.description: If text should be wrapped.

key.name: use-system-font
key.description: If the default system monospace font should be used.

key.name: custom-font
key.description: A custom font to use in the editor.

key.name: style-scheme
key.description: The style scheme to use by the editor. It may translate this into a dark format when available.

key.name: discover-settings
key.description: If enabled then Text Editor will try to discover file settings from modelines, editorconfig, or per-language defaults.

key.name: spellcheck
key.description: If enabled, then Text Editor will check spelling as you type.

key.name: restore-session
key.description: When Text Editor is run, restore the previous session.

key.name: recolor-window
key.description: Use the style-scheme to recolor the application window.

key.name: keybindings
key.description: The keybindings to use within Text Editor.

key.name: last-save-directory
key.description: The directory last used in a save or save-as dialog.

key.name: draw-spaces
key.description: The various types of spaces to draw in the editor.

key.name: enable-snippets
key.description: Enable the use of snippets registered with GtkSourceView from within the editor.

key.name: line-height
key.description: The line height to use for the selected font.
